newsitem.title: UKRAINE: Ukraine Jan-Oct GDP falls 10 pct year-on-year.
newsitem.headline: Ukraine Jan-Oct GDP falls 10 pct year-on-year.

text.p: Ukranian gross domestic product in the first 10 months of this year totalled 61.88 billion hrynias, which was 10 percent less than a year earlier, the Ministry of Statistics said on Wednesday.
Economy Minister Vasyl Hureyev said Ukraine's GDP over the whole of this year would probably fall 7.9 percent, after falling 11.8 percent in 1995.
Ukraine's government is forecasting a 1.7 percent rise in 1997.
